Greetings to Mauritian Political Party 
    Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a message of greetings to the Central Committee of the Mauritian Socialist Militant Movement today on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the movement.
 In the belief that the friendly ties between the two parties would grow stronger in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, the message wished the central committee of the movement greater success in its work for strengthening the movement and achieving the independent development and prosperity of the country.
